title: Facebook
description: Connect with friends and family, share photos, videos, and updates.
articles: Facebook is a global social networking platform created by Meta Platforms, Inc. It allows users to connect with friends, family, colleagues, and communities across the world. Users can share text updates, photos, videos, and live streams to communicate moments of their life in real-time. The platform offers a personalized News Feed where users can see posts from friends, pages, and groups they follow. Facebook also supports interactive features such as liking, commenting, sharing, and reacting with emojis. Users can join interest-based groups, discover events, and participate in community discussions. In addition to personal networking, Facebook provides tools for businesses and creators to reach audiences through Pages, Marketplace, and targeted advertisements. With integrated Messenger and cross-platform accessibility (web, iOS, and Android), Facebook enables seamless communication, entertainment, and social engagement on a global scale.

title: Instagram
description: Share photos and videos, follow friends, explore trends.
articles: Instagram is a popular social media platform developed by Meta Platforms, Inc. It allows users to capture, edit, and share photos and videos with friends, followers, and the global community. Instagram features a personalized feed where users can see posts from people and accounts they follow. Interactive features include liking, commenting, sharing, and saving posts. Users can also post Stories, which disappear after 24 hours, and use Reels for short-form video content. Instagram offers messaging through Direct, IGTV for longer videos, and Explore to discover new content. Businesses and creators can engage audiences with Instagram Pages, Ads, and shopping features. Available on web, iOS, and Android, Instagram enables creative expression, social networking, and community engagement worldwide.

title: Twitter
description: Post tweets, follow topics, and stay updated with news.
articles: Twitter is a microblogging and social networking service that allows users to post short messages called tweets. Developed by Twitter Inc., it provides a platform to share updates, news, and opinions in real time. Users can follow others, like, retweet, reply, and use hashtags to join conversations. Twitter also supports trending topics, lists, and spaces for live audio conversations. It is widely used by individuals, businesses, and public figures for news dissemination, marketing, and engagement. Available on web, iOS, and Android, Twitter enables fast, real-time social interaction and information sharing.

title: YouTube
description: Watch, share, and upload videos worldwide.
articles: YouTube is a video-sharing platform developed by Google LLC that allows users to upload, watch, and share videos worldwide. It provides a wide variety of content, including tutorials, music videos, vlogs, entertainment, and educational materials. Users can create channels, subscribe to others, comment, like, and share content. YouTube also offers live streaming, Shorts for short-form videos, and a recommendation system for personalized content. Businesses and creators use YouTube for marketing, education, and monetization opportunities. Available on web, iOS, and Android, YouTube is one of the largest platforms for video consumption globally.

title: TikTok
description: Create and watch short videos, explore trends, and connect.
articles: TikTok is a social media platform for creating, sharing, and discovering short-form videos. It allows users to create videos with music, filters, and effects, and share them with friends and followers. The app has become popular for its viral challenges, dance trends, and comedic content.

title: LinkedIn
description: Professional networking, connect with colleagues, find jobs.
articles: LinkedIn is a professional networking platform that allows users to connect with colleagues, discover job opportunities, and build their careers. It offers features like job postings, professional groups, and skill endorsements.

title: Reddit
description: Join communities, share content, discuss and vote.
articles: Reddit is a social news aggregation and discussion website where registered members can submit content, such as text, links, and images, to a forum. Other members can then vote and comment on these submissions.

title: Snapchat
description: Send photos and videos that disappear, chat with friends.
articles: Snapchat is a multimedia messaging app where users can send photos and videos that disappear after being viewed. It also offers features like Stories, filters, and lenses.

title: WhatsApp
description: Messaging with voice, video, and group chat features.
articles: WhatsApp is a free messaging app that allows users to send text messages, voice messages, make voice and video calls, and share images, documents, user locations, and other content. It requires a mobile phone number to register.

title: Telegram
description: Secure messaging with channels, groups, and bots.
articles: Telegram is a cloud-based, cross-platform instant messaging service. It allows users to exchange messages, share media and files, and hold private and group voice or video calls as well as public livestreams.

title: Discord
description: Chat, voice, and video for communities and gamers.
articles: Discord is a voice, video, and text communication platform used by over two hundred million people to hang out and play games with their friends. It offers features like voice channels, video calls, and text chats.

title: Spotify
description: Stream music, podcasts, and playlists anytime.
articles: Spotify is a digital music, podcast, and video service that gives you access to millions of songs and other content from creators all over the world. It offers both free and premium subscription models.

title: Skype
description: Video and voice calls, chat with colleagues or friends.
articles: Skype is a telecommunications application that provides video chat and voice call services. It also offers instant messaging, file transfer, and videoconferencing.

title: Signal
articles: Signal is a cross-platform encrypted messaging service developed by the Signal Foundation. It allows users to send text messages, make voice and video calls, and share images, videos, and other files securely. All communication on Signal is end-to-end encrypted, meaning only the sender and recipient can read the messages. Signal also offers features like disappearing messages, screen security, and group chats. It is available on iOS, Android, and desktop, and is widely trusted by privacy-conscious users and organizations around the world.

title: LINE
description: Free messaging, voice and video calls, and stickers.
articles: LINE is a free messaging app developed by LINE Corporation that allows users to send text messages, make voice and video calls, and share images, videos, and files. It also provides social networking features, such as timelines, stickers, group chats, and official accounts for brands and celebrities. LINE supports end-to-end encryption for secure communication and is widely used across Asia for personal and business communication. It is available on iOS, Android, and desktop platforms.

title: Viber
description: Message and call your friends with high-quality VoIP.
articles: Viber is a cross-platform instant messaging and VoIP app developed by Rakuten. It allows users to send text messages, make voice and video calls, and share photos, videos, and other files securely. Viber also supports group chats, stickers, GIFs, and public accounts for brands and celebrities. All messages and calls are end-to-end encrypted to ensure privacy. Viber is available on iOS, Android, and desktop, and is widely used globally for personal and business communication.

title: Clubhouse
description: Social networking via audio chat rooms.

title: Tumblr
articles: Clubhouse is an audio-based social networking app developed by Alpha Exploration Co. Users can join virtual rooms to listen to conversations, interviews, and discussions, or actively participate as speakers. Clubhouse allows real-time audio interactions on a variety of topics, including technology, entertainment, business, and personal development. Users can follow other users, create clubs, and schedule rooms to engage in meaningful conversations. Available on iOS and Android, Clubhouse emphasizes spontaneous and interactive audio communication, offering a unique social experience.

title: Meetup
description: Find and join local groups to meet people and share interests.
articles: Tumblr is a microblogging and social networking platform developed by Automattic. Users can post multimedia content, including text, photos, quotes, links, audio, and video, on their personal blogs. Tumblr allows users to follow other blogs, like, reblog, and comment on posts, fostering a creative and interactive community. It is popular for its diverse content, fandom communities, and niche interest groups. Available on iOS, Android, and web, Tumblr provides a flexible platform for self-expression, content discovery, and social networking.
